ounit 2.0.0


    

      

        

          
    
             
  • 1.1.2
    •  
             
  • 
               version 2.0.0
             
    • 
           
          

        


        

          
            
            
            
            
            
            

              Maintainer
              contact@ocamlpro.com
            

      
            
            
            

              Dependencies
              

        

       ocamlfind
    

      

            

      
            
            
            
            
            

              Published
              Sep 30, 2013
            

      
            
        

        Source  [http] 
        
          http://forge.ocamlcore.org/frs/download.php/1258/ounit-2.0.0.tar.gz

           2e0a24648c55005978d4923eb4925b28 
        		
        

      
             
            
            

              Edit
              
        https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/tree/master/packages/ounit/ounit.2.0.0/opam
      
            

      
          
        


        

    
Unit testing framework loosely based on HUnit. It is similar to JUnit, and other XUnit testing frameworks

    
  


        

    

    
oUnit (findlib)
